languages.text: "Кончай скулить. В твоих интересах — сдохнуть побыстрей, чтобы поменьше мучаться. Ложись и помирай".

traits.locale_text: "И никаких "пожалуйста". В твоих интересах сдохнуть побыстрее, а иначе я позову мясника — порубит тебя на салат для коняшек".

languages.text: "Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."
languages.original_text: "Кончай скулить. В твоих интересах — сдохнуть побыстрей, чтобы поменьше мучаться. Ложись и помирай".

traits.locale_text: "Stop whining. It's in your best interests to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, lie down and die already."
"Stop whining. It's in your best interests to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, lie down and die already."
"Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."
"Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."
"Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."
"Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."

languages.text: “别再抱怨了，赶紧死吧，这是你最好的下场。别再继续让自己受苦了，赶紧躺下来，咽气吧。”
languages.original_text: "Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."

traits.locale_text: “别再抱怨了，赶紧死吧，这是你最好的下场。别再继续让自己受苦了，赶紧躺下来，咽气吧。”

languages.text: «Deja de protestar. Te conviene morir deprisa; no tiene sentido prolongar tu sufrimiento. Venga, túmbate y estira la pata de una vez».
languages.original_text: "Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."

traits.locale_text: «Deja de protestar. Te conviene morir deprisa; no tiene sentido prolongar tu sufrimiento. Venga, túmbate y estira la pata de una vez».

languages.text: "Sızlanmayı kes. Hızlıca ölmek çıkarına olur. Acını uzatmanın anlamı yok. O yüzden uzan ve geber artık."
languages.original_text: "Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."

traits.locale_text: "Sızlanmayı kes. Hızlıca ölmek çıkarına olur. Acını uzatmanın anlamı yok. O yüzden uzan ve geber artık."

languages.text: 「泣き言を言うのはやめてくれ。さっさと死んだ方があんたのためだ。苦痛を長引かせる必要はない。だから、ただ横になって、とっとと死ね」
languages.original_text: "Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."

traits.locale_text: 「泣き言を言うのはやめてくれ。さっさと死んだ方があんたのためだ。苦痛を長引かせる必要はない。だから、ただ横になって、とっとと死ね」

languages.text: « Arrête de geindre, un peu. C'est dans ton intérêt de mourir rapidement. Inutile de prolonger tes souffrances. Alors, allonge-toi là et crève en silence. »
languages.original_text: "Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."

traits.locale_text: « Arrête de geindre, un peu. C'est dans ton intérêt de mourir rapidement. Inutile de prolonger tes souffrances. Alors, allonge-toi là et crève en silence. »

languages.text: "Hör auf zu jammern. Es ist für dich das Beste, wenn du einfach schnell stirbst. Warum solltest du dein Leid unnötig verlängern? Also leg dich einfach hin und stirb endlich."
languages.original_text: "Stop whining. It's in your best interest to die quickly — no point in prolonging your own suffering. So, just lie down and croak already."

traits.locale_text: "Hör auf zu jammern. Es ist für dich das Beste, wenn du einfach schnell stirbst. Warum solltest du dein Leid unnötig verlängern? Also leg dich einfach hin und stirb endlich."
